function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to take action to avoid the increase of infected individuals by the SARS-CoV-2 virus.","Impact":"High number of lost lives, exceeding the Healthcare System critical limit.","Mitigation":"Implementation of interventions to control the spread of the virus, including measures to reduce contact and transmission.","Technologies":"Healthcare technology for testing, tracing, and treatment of COVID-19.","People":"General population, healthcare workers, government officials.","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, public health authorities."}]}
